content: हैमवत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (ती|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [हिमवतो अदूरभवो देशः तस्येदं वा अण्] {@--1@} Snowy. {@--2@} Flowing from the snowy, {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} Himālaya, mountain; <ls>R. 16. 44.</ls> {@--3@} Bred in, belonging to, or situated on, the Himālaya mountain; <ls>Ku. 3. 23</ls>, <ls n="Ku.">2. 67.</ls> --तः A kind of poison. --तं Bhāratavarṣa or India.
हैमवती {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Pārvatī. {@--2@} Of the river Ganges. {@--3@} A kind of myrobalan. {@--4@} A kind of drug. {@--5@} Common flax. {@--6@} A tawny grape.
